mapper.insert: INSERT INTO practice_record(subject_id, user_id, answer, paper_id, points, create_time, update_time) VALUE (#{r.subjectId}, #{r.userId}, #{r.answer}, #{r.paperId}, #{r.points}, #{r.createTime}, #{r.updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, subject_id, user_id, answer, paper_id, points, create_time, update_time FROM practice_record WHERE user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 0,1
SELECT id, subject_id, user_id, answer, paper_id, points, create_time, update_time FROM practice_record WHERE id = #{id}
